data.persona: My great-grandfather was a duke.  My family used to own a castle.  I have out coat of arms on my mantle.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
The dining hall has a long, elegant wooden table with ornate chairs at both ends and along the sides. There are place settings at each seat with a rustic silverware set and gold plates. The wall is decorated with paintings of knights and past royalty.
There's a painting., a wooden table, and an ornate chair here.
The dockworker is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a Kings sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to get seated on the ornate chair
data.mid_motivation: I am getting ready to eat; dinner will be served in about an hour
data.long_motivation: I must be recognized and treated with respect, I should not have to do anything
